name: Battle of Beans
description:
- The game stands on a wave system that makes the game harder after each wave.

- Weapons will be spawned in a random location at a random time, also spells do.

- Some enemies give you weapons after their death to get extra ammo.

- The game is infinite you can play it till the wave you want.

- This is just the first version of the game, updates will come.
